description.zh-cn: 根据1949年9月27日《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》设立的中央人民政府政务院下属部门，负责全国范围内的公安工作。1954年9月改组为中华人民共和国公安部。
description.en: A department under the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government established in accordance with the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China' on September 27, 1949, responsible for public security work nationwide. It was reorganized into the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China in September 1954.

nodes.id: 政务院政治法律委员会

zh-cn: 政务院政治法律委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府政务院的下属机构，负责指导公安、司法等工作。
description.en: A subordinate body of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government, responsible for guiding public security, judicial, and other related work.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1949年至1954年间的中央人民政府下属的国家政务最高执行机关，1954年改组为中华人民共和国国务院。
description.en: The highest executive body for state affairs under the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954, which was reorganized into the State Council of the People's Republic of China in 1954.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议

description.zh-cn: 此次会议通过了《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》，为中央人民政府的成立奠定了法律基础。
description.en: This session passed the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China', laying the legal foundation for the establishment of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的临时宪法性文件，规定了中央人民政府的组织结构和职权。
description.en: A provisional constitutional document in the early days of the People's Republic of China that stipulated the organizational structure and powers of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国1949年至1954年间的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The supreme state authority of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府的最高决策机构。
description.en: The highest decision-making body of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中央人民政府公安部部长、国务院副总理等职。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the Minister of Public Security of the Central People's Government and Vice Premier of the State Council.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议于1954年9月召开，通过了《中华人民共和国宪法》和《中华人民共和国国务院组织法》，标志着国家政治体制的重大变革。
description.en: The first session of the 1st National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China was held in September 1954. It passed the 'Constitution of the People's Republic of China' and the 'Organic Law of the State Council of the People's Republic of China', marking a major change in the national political system.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法，规定了国家的根本制度和根本任务。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China, which stipulates the fundamental system and tasks of the state.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组织法

description.zh-cn: 规定中华人民共和国国务院的组织制度和工作制度的法律。
description.en: A law that stipulates the organizational and working systems of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府，是最高国家权力机关的执行机关，是最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, which is the executive body of the highest organ of state power and the highest state administrative organ.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门，是中华人民共和国人民警察的最高领导和指挥机关。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of public security work nationwide, and the supreme leading and command organ of the People's Police of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民革命军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民革命军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设置的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The supreme military leading body established in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民革命军事委员会公安部

zh-cn: 中国人民革命军事委员会公安部

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府公安部的前身机构。
description.en: The predecessor organization of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府公安部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Minister of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府公安部办公厅主任兼六局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the General Office and Director of the Sixth Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第六十一军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第六十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个军。
description.en: An army corps of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府公安部办公厅副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府公安部办公厅副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府公安部二局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Second Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第十四军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第十四军

description.en: An army corps of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Third Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第四十军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四十军

description.en: An army corps of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府公安部四局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Fourth Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第二十五军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个军。
description.en: An army corps of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Fifth Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第六十五军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个军。
description.en: An army corps of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任东北人民政府公安部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security of the Northeast People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期东北大区的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Northeast Greater Administrative Region in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任西北军政委员会公安部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security of the Northwest Military and Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期西北大区的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Northwest Greater Administrative Region in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任西南军政委员会公安部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security of the Southwest Military and Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期西南大区的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Southwest Greater Administrative Region in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任华东军政委员会公安部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security of the East China Military and Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期华东大区的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the East China Greater Administrative Region in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中南军政委员会公安部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security of the Central South Military and Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期中南大区的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Central South Greater Administrative Region in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任华南军政委员会公安部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister of Public Security of the South China Military and Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期华南地区的军事管制机构。
description.en: The military control body of the South China region in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市公安局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Shanghai Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 上海市人民政府下属的公安机关。
description.en: The public security organ under the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任南京市公安局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Nanjing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 南京市人民政府下属的公安机关。
description.en: The public security organ under the Nanjing Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任天津市公安局局长。

description.zh-cn: 天津市人民政府下属的公安机关。
description.en: The public security organ under the Tianjin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 北京市人民政府下属的公安机关。
description.en: The public security organ under the Beijing Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province, China.

relationships.target: 政务院政治法律委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府公安部在政务院政治法律委员会的指导下展开工作。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government operated under the guidance of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee of the Government Administration Council.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府公安部是中央人民政府政务院的下属部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government was a department under the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议通过了《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》。
description.en: The First Plenary Session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference passed the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府公安部根据《中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法》第十八条的规定设置。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government was established in accordance with Article 18 of the 'Organic Law of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China'.

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月19日，中央人民政府委员会第三次会议任命罗瑞卿为公安部部长。
description.en: On October 19, 1949, the third meeting of the Central People's Government Council appointed Luo Ruiqing as the Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿担任中央人民政府公安部首任部长。
description.en: Luo Ruiqing served as the first Minister of the Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿兼任北京市公安局局长。
description.en: Luo Ruiqing concurrently served as the Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过了《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: The first session of the 1st National People's Congress passed the 'Constitution of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院组织法

description.zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过了《中华人民共和国国务院组织法》。
description.en: The first session of the 1st National People's Congress passed the 'Organic Law of the State Council of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月第一届全国人民代表大会召开后，通过了新的宪法和国务院组织法，中央人民政府及其所属机构（包括公安部）随之结束。
description.en: After the 1st National People's Congress convened in September 1954 and passed a new constitution and the Organic Law of the State Council, the Central People's Government and its subordinate agencies (including the Ministry of Public Security) were terminated.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月第一届全国人民代表大会召开后，原中央人民政府公安部改组为中华人民共和国公安部，成为新成立的国务院的组成部门。
description.en: After the 1st National People's Congress convened in September 1954, the former Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government was reorganized into the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China, becoming a constituent department of the newly established State Council.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国公安部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China is a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国人民革命军事委员会公安部

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府公安部由中国人民革命军事委员会公安部改组而来。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the Central People's Government was reorganized from the Public Security Department of the People's Revolutionary Military Commission.

position.en: Vice Minister and Director of the First Bureau

position.zh-cn: 办公厅主任兼六局局长
position.en: Director of the General Office and Director of the Sixth Bureau

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第六十一军

description.zh-cn: 徐子荣由中国人民解放军第六十一军政委调任至公安部。
description.en: Xu Zirong was transferred from the position of Political Commissar of the 61st Army of the PLA to the Ministry of Public Security.

position.en: Deputy Director of the General Office
Deputy Director of the General Office

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第十四军

description.zh-cn: 雷荣天由中国人民解放军第十四军政委调任至公安部。
description.en: Lei Rongtian was transferred from the position of Political Commissar of the 14th Army of the PLA to the Ministry of Public Security.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第四十军

description.zh-cn: 卓雄由中国人民解放军第四十军政委调任至公安部。
description.en: Zhuo Xiong was transferred from the position of Political Commissar of the 40th Army of the PLA to the Ministry of Public Security.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第二十五军

position.zh-cn: 副政治委员兼政治部主任
position.en: Deputy Political Commissar and Director of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 邓少东由中国人民解放军第二十五军副政治委员兼政治部主任调任至公安部。
description.en: Deng Shaodong was transferred from the position of Deputy Political Commissar and Director of the Political Department of the 25th Army of the PLA to the Ministry of Public Security.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第六十五军

position.en: Deputy Political Commissar and Director of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 蔡顺礼由中国人民解放军第六十五军副政委兼政治部主任调任至公安部。
description.en: Cai Shunli was transferred from the position of Deputy Political Commissar and Director of the Political Department of the 65th Army of the PLA to the Ministry of Public Security.
